product_name: Marmot Essence Rain Pants - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight, waterproof and breathable, the men's Marmot Essence Rain Pants keep you dry in the backcountry without weighing you down. Ripstop nylon with MemBrain(R) Strata(TM) waterproof breathable laminate protects you from wind and rain. Elastic pull-on waist; zippered back pocket. Dry Touch technology next to the skin reduces condensation and that sticky, clammy feeling. All seams are taped to ensure full waterproof, windproof protection. Marmot Essence Rain Pants for men are designed to fit over hiking pants. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight, waterproof and breathable, the men's Marmot Essence Rain Pants keep you dry in the backcountry without weighing you down.
